title: Summer Friday #2: Inside the Writers Room | Summer Book Club
description:
On the second edition of the Late Night Podcast: Summer Fridays, hear a special message from Trump's upcoming Space Force.

Then, a delicate issue is resolved in the Late Night writers room, represented by John Lutz and Mike Karnell and judged by Amber Ruffin.

After that, Late Night head writer Alex Baze and staff writer Mike Scollins talk about what it's like writing comedy during this unique time.

Finally, we hear summer book recommendations from Zach Woods, Rakesh Satyal and George Saunders.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
